name: Jump 'n Loop
description:
Help a planet jumper to keep the beat.

You stuck in an endless loop around a lifeless planet. Jump to avoid evil triangles and try to keep alive until the end of a track.

Note: best played with sound, since you need to hear the beat.

Controls:

Jump with X/Space/Shift/Enter

Use arrow keys to navigate the menu.

Tools:

  • Collider.JAM - a framework optimized for rapid game dev
  • JavaScript
  • Ardour & Korg Kaossilator Pro for the soundtrack
